entries.name: diehockn.com
entries.text: This is my personal website. It's not really built to handle anything substantial, i just wanted to build something and put it on the internet. Kind of as  challange and i just found it neat

entries.name: Beacon Calculator
entries.description: A library for calculating Minecraft Beacon colors
entries.text: This is the first library I have ever written. Originally i just thought it would be a neat programming challange. I first implemented it in python. That worked but way increadibly slow. So I rewrote the tool in rust and later turned it into a library to be used by everyone
